inclusion.criterion: Refractory ascites defined according to the International Ascites Club criteria
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: congestive heart failure (defined by clinical exam and echocardiogram)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: hepatocellular carcinoma based on the Barcelona Clinic liver Cancer (BCLC) criteria
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has refractory ascites, but no congestive heart failure or acute renal failure. However, hepatocellular carcinoma is a possible exclusion criterion.
